subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|順に|じゅん に}}: in order, in turn
* {{ja-r|順%位|じゅん%い}}: order, rank
* {{ja-r|順%応|じゅん%のう}}: adaptation, sympathy
* {{ja-r|順%次|じゅん%じ}}: in order, sequential
* {{ja-r|順%守|じゅん%しゅ}}: compliance, adherence
* {{ja-r|順%序|じゅん%じょ}}: order, sequence
* {{ja-r|順%法|じゅん%ぽう}}: law observance
* {{ja-r|順%調|じゅん%ちょ}}: favorable, doing well
* {{ja-r|順%当|じゅん%とう}}: proper, right
* {{ja-r|順%番|じゅん%ばん}}: turn, order of things
* {{ja-r|順%路|じゅん%ろ}}: route
* {{ja-r|順%風|じゅん%ぷう}}: favorable wind
* {{ja-r|順%順に|じゅん%じゅん に}}: in order, in turn
* {{ja-r|恭%順|きょう%じゅん}}: obedience, submission
* {{ja-r|従%順|じゅう%じゅん}}: docile, domesticated
* {{ja-r|打%順|だ%じゅん}}: batting order
* {{ja-r|手%順|て%じゅん}}: process, procedure
* {{ja-r|筆%順|ひつ%じゅん}}: stroke order
* {{ja-r|不%順|ふ%じゅん}} irregularity, unseasonableness
* {{ja-r|道%順|みち%じゅん}}: itinerary, route
* {{ja-r|先%着%順|せん%ちゃく%じゅん}}: order of arrival
* {{ja-r|年%齢%順|ねん%れい%じゅん}}: priority of age
* {{ja-r|Ａ%Ｂ%Ｃ%順|エー%ビー%シー%じゅん}}: alphabetical order
* {{ja-r|アルファベット順|アルファベットじゅん}}: alphabetical order
{{der-bottom}}
